input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 2''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='Balsam Hill Classic Blue Spruce Traditional Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Classic Blue Spruce Traditional Green'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Noble Fir Narrow Tree'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 7.5-ft. Flocked Snowy Pine Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Flip Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Norway Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company National Tree Co. 7 ft. Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='6ft Tall Unlit Pencil Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Realistic Branches and Steel Base'
  - Name='Ebern Designs Tall Unlit Pencil Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 6.5 ft.'
  - Name='National Tree Company 9 ft. Dunhill Fir Slim Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill White Fir Tree'
  - Name='WELLFOR 9 ft. Green Unlit Full Artificial Christmas Tree CM-HWY-21222'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 9 Ft. Sugar Hill Snowy Christmas Tree, Pinecones and 1000 Dual LED Lights'
  - Name='Gerson Company Un-Lit 30" Hard Needle Pine with Burlap Bag Base (Set of 2)'
  - Name='Haute Decor Berkley Fir Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Berkshire Mountain Fir Traditional 7.5 ft Green Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Dunhill Fir Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Latitude Run 9ft Tall Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Latitude Run 7.5 Foot Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Balsam Fir Flip Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Classic Blue Spruce Traditional Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar function as full artificial Christmas tree with hinged branches but different species and brand; less closely matched silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Classic Blue Spruce Traditional Green
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as above but without 'Artificial Christmas Tree' in name; likely same product offering, moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Noble Fir Narrow Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar type fir tree but narrow silhouette and different brand; less full-bodied branches; somewhat relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 7.5-ft. Flocked Snowy Pine Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree but flocked (snowy) and pine species differ; less relevant due to appearance and shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Flip Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial tree with flip branches, but different species (white spruce) and different brand reduces relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Norway Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Norway spruce tree; same function but different species shape and brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company National Tree Co. 7 ft. Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Extremely close match; same brand, Dunhill Fir model, height and pre-lit clear lights as reference; almost identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6ft Tall Unlit Pencil Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Realistic Branches and Steel Base
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar size and fir type but unlit and pencil (narrow) silhouette differs greatly from full-bodied Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ebern Designs Tall Unlit Pencil Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unlit pencil fir tree from different brand; less relevance due to silhouette and lack of pre-strung lights.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 6.5 ft.
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and fir type with close height; likely same construction and design, very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9 ft. Dunhill Fir Slim Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and model line but a slim tree instead of full-bodied, with clear lights; somewhat less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill White Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and similar species (White Fir) but different fir type and potentially different branch style; moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: WELLFOR 9 ft. Green Unlit Full Artificial Christmas Tree CM-HWY-21222
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Full artificial tree but unlit, different brand and no model details; less relevance in features and brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 9 Ft. Sugar Hill Snowy Christmas Tree, Pinecones and 1000 Dual LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial tree with lights and pinecones, different brand, flocked (snowy), larger size; moderate relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Gerson Company Un-Lit 30" Hard Needle Pine with Burlap Bag Base (Set of 2)
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much smaller, unlit, pine species, very different style and use (likely decorative), less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Haute Decor Berkley Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely artificial fir tree but different brand with no lighting info and unclear height; low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Berkshire Mountain Fir Traditional 7.5 ft Green Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unlit traditional fir tree from reputable brand but unlit, different species name; moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Dunhill Fir Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dunhill Fir model with clear lights from a competitor brand; similar silhouette and features; highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Latitude Run 9ft Tall Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree but no specific fir type or detail; similar purpose but less specific match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Latitude Run 7.5 Foot Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same general artificial Christmas tree category, 7.5 ft height; lacks detail on type, less relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Balsam Fir Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir species and flip hinged branches but different brand and possibly slimmer silhouette; moderately relevant.
